gpu:variable.name: const_ev_collisions
gpu:variable.description: Boolean flag to determine at runtime if ev collisions could happen in the simulation

gpu:variable.name: boundaries_enabled
gpu:variable.description: Boolean flag

gpu:variable.name: const_Boltzmann
gpu:variable.description: Boltzmann constant

gpu:variable.name: const_Temperature_K
gpu:variable.description: Temperature (Kelvins) (20-25C) + 237.15

gpu:variable.name: const_Boltzmann_x_Temp_K
gpu:variable.description: Value needed for computing the diffusion rate

gpu:variable.name: const_water_viscosity
gpu:variable.description: Dynamic viscosity of water at 20C, source http://www.viscopedia.com/viscosity-tables/substances/water/

gpu:variable.name: const_6_pi_viscosity
gpu:variable.description: Value required for computing viscosity and drag

gpu:variable.name: const_boltzmann_x_temp
gpu:variable.description: Value required for computing viscosity and drag

gpu:variable.name: const_pi_4div3
gpu:variable.description: Precomputed value for 4/3 * Pi

gpu:variable.name: const_mass_per_volume_unit
gpu:variable.description: Precomputed value for 100 nm ev mass / 100nm volume

gpu:variable.name: new_evs_random_direction
gpu:variable.description: Boolean flag

gpu:variable.name: dt
gpu:variable.description: The timestep of the model

gpu:variable.name: dof
gpu:variable.description: Degrees of Freedom in the model

gpu:variable.name: angle
gpu:variable.description: angle of inclination with respect to horizon, in RADIANS. For visualisation purposes only

gpu:function.name: output_secretory_cell_location
gpu:function.description: Adds the cell position to the "location" message list. This list is used for collision detection purposes.

gpu:function.name: secrete_ev
gpu:function.description: Introduces a new EV agent into the simulation based on some probabilistic rules.

gpu:variable.name: angle
gpu:variable.description: angle of inclination with respect to horizon, in degrees

gpu:function.name: output_ciliary_cell_location
gpu:function.description: Adds the cell location to the "location" message list. This list is used for collision detection purposes.

gpu:variable.name: vx
gpu:variable.description: The component on X of velocity_um

gpu:variable.name: vy
gpu:variable.description: The component on Y of velocity_um

gpu:variable.name: mass_kg
gpu:variable.description: Mass of the vesicle in KG

gpu:variable.name: velocity_ums
gpu:variable.description: Velocity in um/s - mean diffusion distance obtained from MSD

gpu:variable.name: velocity_ms
gpu:variable.description: Velocity in um/s - mean diffusion distance obtained from MSD

gpu:function.name: output_data
gpu:function.description: Adds the EV's current position to the "location" message list. This list is used for collision detection purposes.

gpu:function.name: test_secretory_cell_collision
gpu:function.description: Checks for possible collisions with secretory boundaries. Outputs an optional collision_message. EVs colliding with a cell contain the parameter "closest_cell_id" > -1 and have a value on "closest_cell_distance"

gpu:function.name: secretory_cell_collision_resolution
gpu:function.description: Corrects the position of an EV as a result of colliding with a cell. This function only applies to EVs with variable "closest_cell_id" > -1 & (closest_ev_id == -1 || closest_cell_distance < closest_ev_distance)

gpu:function.name: test_ciliary_cell_collision
gpu:function.description: Checks for possible collisions with ciliary boundaries. Outputs an optional collision_message. EVs colliding with a cell contain the parameter "closest_cell_id" > -1 and have a value on "closest_cell_distance"

gpu:function.name: ciliary_cell_collision_resolution
gpu:function.description: Corrects the position of an EV as a result of colliding with a ciliary cell. This function only applies to EVs with variable "closest_cell_id" > -1 & (closest_ev_id == -1 || closest_cell_distance < closest_ev_distance)

gpu:function.name: test_ev_collision
gpu:function.description: Checks for possible collisions with other EVs. Outputs an optional collision_message. EVs colliding with another EV contain the parameter "closest_ev_id" > -1 and have a value on "closest_ev_distance"

gpu:function.name: ev_collision_resolution
gpu:function.description: Corrects the position of an EV involved in a collision with another EV. This function applies to EVs with variable "closest_ev_id" > -1
